entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Clearing before morning. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature steady near minus 4 except low minus 10 inland.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 4 except low minus 10 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 04 January 2023
